Around 25% FY21 with change in product profile- shifting to high margin transformers of 160 MVA & increase in elevator business.. EBIDTA margin is around 5-6%. Business entails supply to SEBs and avg debtors' cycle is relatively high at 4-5 months.. investments in MFs/ VCFs/ Cash /FDs of Rs. 174 cr as on 31.3.23, and part of profits are being earned from these investments. It is rated BBB+ by Infomerics. We may stipulate that there should not be more than 10% deviation in. ABS'23 & provisional numbers provided.- Borrower is banking under consortium arrangement led by Bank of Baroda.. With growing scale of business, enhancement in WC by Rs. 205 cr is envisaged. Present proposal is for sanction of WC limit of Rs. 60 cr, constituting ~14% share in WC arrangement. ICICI & SBM has sanctioned incremental limits, while process is underway with other lenders. Our limits to be released post induction of our Bank in the consortium. WC limits 50% pending security creation.- BG tenor of 6 yrs excluding claim period has been sought and maybe discussed in RCC.. Also, interchangeability between LC/BG is proposed to allow flexibility to avail limits based upon need-based requirement. NFB limits shall have Nil cash margin in line with other lenders. - Based upon the aforesaid, experienced promoter group. and acceptable financial position, proposal maybe considered favourably.Proposal is in line with DCC-IP discussion.- All standard terms but for modifications/ deviations approved, covenants stipulated by committee members in CPS and. covenants agreed in replies to Underwriting comments to be complied/ stipulated.","label":"90652521-1b24-43d3-bea6-4e3d43a9ae34","height":597.4708771929824},"620eb9c2-33e2-4145-b35c-931649f2b9bc":{"comments":"","top":1711.9838596491227,"left":293.1778583829365,"document":"https://lumenai-demo.s3.amazonaws.com/878a069d-a6b0-4123-8078-a1bb1de8d416/CAM_ECE-page2_bw.png","width":88.60714285714285,"extractedText":"No
